sense.def: AN: chan hou feng 產後風 , wind following delivery; chan hou feng jing 產後風痙 , wind with spasms following delivery; chan hou feng chu 產後風搐 , wind with tic following delivery; chan hou chu nuo 產後搐搦 , convulsions following delivery. Pathological Condition of po shang feng 破傷風 , wound wind, brought about in women after parturition because of an intrusion of wind evil via the puerperal sores. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 Recipe Entry du huo tang 獨活湯 , decoction with du huo : 治產後中風，口噤不能言 , “It cures wind stroke following delivery with clenched jaw and an inability to speak”.
